answers.answer: I'm almost 39 weeks now. But at my 37 week checkup my doctor told me that my blood pressure was too high and that I was starting to develop preeclampsia. He wrote me off work and I've been on bed rest since. I'm still not dilated or open. I've gone to having two appointments a week so he can keep an eye on me. He says that my body isn't ready to even be induced, and this is my second child. I'm terrified I've done something wrong. I hope things work out for you though, good luck!

Yea sounds just like my story kb243708 the appointment I have later this week Is to check my pressure again...so hopefully it's not high again...it's never been high before so this is all new to me during this pregnancy...

During my 37 week check up, I wasn't dilated at all, but the baby was head down! Also my blood pressure was high, that was on Friday, I was told to rest and don't do a lot! I had another appointment today, sadly it was still high, MY DOCTOR SAID I MIGHT GET INDUCED! cuz she said if they wait for my due date my blood pressure might higher! I REALLY DONT WANT TO GET INDUCED

question: Went to my 37 week check up...cervix is still close which is fine with me no hurry lol but dr informed me that my blood pressure was high so he restricted me from work nn put me to rest...but I'm wondering if this means I'm getting induce? He didn't really say anything about it just gave me another appointment on Thurs to check blood pressure!
title: high blood pressure!
